purpose: Provide a central place for regional finance controllers to upload forecasts, compare against targets, and visualize variance in interactive reports.
business_value: Improves forecast accuracy through standard templates
Enables CFO and leadership to track financial KPIs across regions
Reduces time spent on monthly reporting

mvp_components.app_details: A custom app for regional controllers to upload and update forecast data.

app_screens.screen_details: Screen to upload monthly forecasts by cost center.

features.feat_0007: Navigation Controls to Switch Between App Screens
features.feat_0008: Help Icon with Tooltip for Instructions
features.feat_0009: Screen Header with App Name and Screen Title
features.feat_0011: User Information Display (e.g., Logged-in User Name)
features.feat_0013: Security Role Validation to Restrict Access
features.feat_0014: Integration with Power BI for Data Visualization

app_screens.screen_details: Screen to compare planned vs. actual data.

features.feat_0020: Integration with Power BI for Advanced Analytics

mvp_components.app_details: Interactive dashboards to visualize financial data, highlight outliers, and compare against targets.

app_screens.screen_details: Dashboard to view KPIs and financial data across regions.

mvp_components.flow_details: Scheduled flow to refresh data from the source system daily.

flow_actions.action_details: Trigger to refresh data on a daily basis.

actions.action_0001: Trigger to refresh data on a daily basis

post_mvp_modules.details: Extension to add transaction-level drilldown capabilities to the existing dashboard.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the Power BI dashboard to include drilldown features for detailed analysis.

post_mvp_modules.details: Extension to add predictive trend lines for key KPIs within the dashboard.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Integrate advanced analytics within Power BI to generate predictive insights.

post_mvp_modules.details: Feature to allow users to export dashboards to PDF/Excel with embedded charts.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Implement export functionality within Power BI, ensuring it supports the required formats.

constraints: Data must be refreshed daily from source system
Reports must respect role-based access (e.g., region visibility)
Visualizations must support filtering by fiscal year/quarter
notes: The solution must be scalable to accommodate future enhancements such as predictive analytics and detailed transaction drilldowns.
